infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: KIKU uses your microphone to analyze voice messages for child safety and detect inappropriate content or threats.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: KIKU uses your location to provide emergency SOS alerts with precise location data to parents and guardians in critical situations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: KIKU uses background location to enable emergency SOS functionality, ensuring child safety even when the app is not actively in use.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: KIKU uses your location for emergency SOS alerts to help parents respond quickly to safety concerns.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: KIKU uses your camera to capture and analyze images for inappropriate content, helping protect children from harmful visual material.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: KIKU accesses your photo library to analyze shared images for child safety, detecting potentially harmful or inappropriate content.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: KIKU accesses your contacts to help parents create whitelists of approved contacts for their children.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: KIKU uses Face ID to provide secure biometric authentication, protecting sensitive parental controls and child safety settings.
